command: iptables -I INPUT -m recent --name t1205_dns --rcheck --seconds 60 -p tcp --dport 9091 -j ACCEPT; iptables -I INPUT -p udp --dport 53 -m string --string "MAGICDNS" --algo bm -m recent --name t1205_dns --set -j LOG --log-prefix "T1205-DNS-SIGNAL "; nc -l -p 9091 -k >/dev/null 2>&1 &
explanation: Watches for a crafted UDP/53 payload containing the ASCII token MAGICDNS, logs it, and temporarily allows TCP/9091 for the sender. Simulates DNS-layer signaling to activate a gated listener.
rationale_steps: Match unusual DNS application data to set a recent list entry
Log the anomalous DNS packet for detection
Enable a hidden listener only for recently signaled sources
